Topic.Title: Print Expression: Starting a new line?[SOLVED]

Posts.EditableText: So I understand generally how to use Print, both Print Message and Print Expression. But for Print Expression, how do you start a new line? I can't find the syntax.
Posts.HTML: So I understand generally how to use Print, both Print Message and Print Expression. But for Print Expression, how do you start a new line? I can't find the syntax.

Posts.EditableText:
Generally the best way in either case is with another Print. If you really need a break in the middle of an expression, use `
`. Eg: ``` "This is the first line.
Now on a second line."
Posts.HTML:
Generally the best way in either case is with another Print. If you really need a break in the middle of an expression, use <br/>. Eg:

"This is the first line.<br/>Now on a second line."
